"'Hollow'" is a single by the American rock band Alice in Chains, from the
band's upcoming fifth studio album [[The Devil Put Dinosaurs Here]], expected to
be released in May 2013. On December 18, 2012, the band debuted the song on
YouTube with a fan made lyric video. "http://www.theprp.com/2012/12/21/news/alice-in-chains-working-on-
hollow-music-video/ The lyric video contains static images submitted by
fans via Instagram. The song was made available for digital download on January
8, 2013.
categories: Billboard Hot Mainstream Rock Tracks number-one singles
